sn22.61:1.2: “Rupam, bhikkhave, adittam, vedana aditta, sanna aditta, sankhara aditta, vinnanam adittam.
sn22.61:1.3: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako rupasmimpi nibbindati, vedanayapi … sannayapi … sankharesupi … vinnanasmimpi nibbindati.
sn22.61:1.4: Nibbindam virajjati; viraga vimuccati. Vimuttasmim vimuttamiti nanam hoti.
sn22.61:1.5: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati”ti.
